Articles.Content:
Hi all, my first craft worthy of sharing with the community. It flies very poorly in atmosphere as you can imagine, so expect a large launch vehicle or some "liquid schwartz" (gravity hack) to get it into orbit. The oscar fuel tanks on the bottom aren't connected by fuel lines so you will have to manually transfer fuel to use them. Let me know what you think, any suggestions are welcome to make it a more efficient craft.

Eagle 5.craft

Jeb: Why are we stuck in orbit?

Bill: I knew we should have put more than 5 bucks in at the station!

Ludicrous speed!

Someone needs to build that ship. I can't imagine the part count...
Off topic: is space balls a good movie?

Off topic: is space balls a good movie?

Spaceballs is hilarious! As a sci-fi it isn't particularly good and it doesn't have to be, it's a sci-fi spoof like only Mel Brooks can make.

Sci-fi references made in Spaceballs are mainly Star Wars, Star Trek and Alien but there are many more.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0094012/

This is nice! Downloading it right now!

EDIT: By nice i mean HOLY CRAP:)

Off topic: is space balls a good movie?

You need to go to your room and stay there until you watch it. Spaceballs should be a requirement in life.

You need to go to your room and stay there until you watch it. Spaceballs should be a requirement in life.

Along with the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. I mean, HOW CAN YOU nOT

He must have secret hyperjets on that thing!

Best. Movie. Ever.

Plus, Coolest Sci-Fi KSP Ship I've Ever Seen, Holy Damn.
I love it. Great work. And I am still laughing by typing.
Only one man would dare give me the raspberry...LONESTAR!!!!!
Wow, thank you for the kind words. I'm thinking of doing Mega Maid next, but I doubt I have the patience to build it or the computer to load that many parts!
